products.name: Metric ED Displacement Sensor
products.design: ED structure linear displacement sensor with analog output options and precise position measurement capability for automation and control applications.
products.features: High precision linear displacement measurement with ED structure, mounting clamps for easy installation, various stroke lengths available (e.g., 300mm), analog output options (e.g., 0-10V), A-type sockets and connectors (DIN46530), single magnet blocks, and comprehensive accessories including square magnet gaskets, spacers, screws, and insulating washers.
products.differentiator: Precise position measurement for control loops

specifications.accessories: Square magnet gaskets, square magnets, spacers, screws, mounting clamps, insulating washers

products.name: Metric EP Displacement Sensor
products.design: Compact structure linear displacement sensor with convenient disassembly and assembly features, offering multiple output signal options and CE certification for industrial automation.
products.features: High precision linear displacement measurement with compact structure, measurement range from 50mm to 2500mm (customization available), multiple current output options (4-20mA, 20-4mA, 0-20mA, 20-0mA) and voltage output options (0-10V, 10-0V, 0-5V, 5-0V), exceptional environmental resistance with shock index GB/T2423.5 50g(11ms) and vibration index GB/T2423.10 10g/10-2000Hz.
products.differentiator: Compact structure, convenient disassembly and assembly

products.name: Metric ES Displacement Sensor
products.design: Rugged and fully enclosed linear displacement sensor designed for harsh environments, featuring non-wear, non-contact measurement technology with multiple interface options including Modbus.
products.features: High precision linear displacement measurement with rugged, fully enclosed design. Non-wear, non-contact measurement method, stroke length from 50-2500 mm (customization available), multiple interface options including Modbus, exceptional environmental ratings with shock index GB/T2423.5 50g (11ms) and vibration index GB/T2423.10 10g/10-2000Hz.

products.name: MH Series Magnetostrictive Sensor
products.design: Absolute, non-contact magnetostrictive position sensor with high precision and robust protection (IP67/IP69K) for mobile hydraulics and railway systems, offering analog and bus protocol outputs.
products.features: High precision absolute, non-contact position measurement using magnetostrictive sensing principle. Stroke length from 50mm to 2500mm, ±0.2 mm resolution, < ±0.005% Full Scale repeatability, < ±0.04% F.S. linearity, IP67 and IP69K protection class, multiple output signals including analog (VDC, Current) and bus protocols (CANbus, CANopen, SAE J1939).

specifications.output_signals: Analog (VDC, Current), Bus protocols (CANbus, CANopen, SAE J1939)

products.name: RB2- Magnetostrictive Sensor
products.design: Built-in magnetostrictive sensor specifically designed for installation in hydraulic cylinders, featuring non-wear, non-contact absolute position output with exceptional accuracy and pressure resistance up to 35MPa.
products.features: High precision displacement measurement with built-in installation design for hydraulic cylinders. Non-wear, non-contact, absolute position output with 0.01% nonlinearity, 0.001% repetition accuracy, 35MPa continuous pressure resistance, and analog and SSI output options.

products.name: PS500 Electronic Digital Display Pressure Sensor
products.design: Electronic pressure sensor with high-brightness LED digital display rotatable by 330°, featuring robust all-metal construction and diffused silicon sensing element for accurate pressure measurement.
products.features: High accuracy pressure measurement with high-brightness LED digital display rotatable by 330°. Measuring range from 100 mbar up to 1000 bar, 12-30 Vdc input voltage, robust all-metal construction, and diffused silicon sensing element.
products.differentiator: High-brightness LED digital display, rotatable by 330°

products.name: TS420 Intelligent Temperature Controller Sensor
products.design: Intelligent temperature controller with PT100 sensor and high-precision A/D conversion, featuring 4-digit LED digital tube display and digital PID adjustment for precise temperature control.
products.applications: Hydropower, water treatment, petroleum, chemical, machinery, and hydraulic systems
products.features: High-precision temperature measurement using PT100 sensor with A/D conversion. 4-digit LED digital tube display for clear, real-time temperature monitoring, four relay outputs and a 4-20mA standard signal output, 24VDC or 220VAC power supply options, and digital PID adjustment for precise control.
products.differentiator: 4-digit LED digital tube display for clear, real-time temperature monitoring

specifications.outputs: Four relay outputs and a 4-20mA standard signal output

products.name: PS200 Electronic Pressure Switch Sensor
products.design: Compact electronic pressure switch with diffused silicon sensor, featuring configurable PNP/NPN and normally open/normally closed output with fast response time and IP67 protection.
products.features: High accuracy pressure switch (≤±0.5% of range) with diffused silicon sensor. 12-30 Vdc supply voltage, <10ms response time, IP67 protection grade, and PNP/NPN and normally open/normally closed configurable output.
products.differentiator: PNP/NPN and normally open/normally closed configurable output

products.name: HP Position Sensor
products.design: Non-contacting Hall-effect or Inductive position sensor designed for harsh environments, featuring configurable angular ranges from 50 to 360 degrees with ratiometric analog output and up to 50 million cycle lifetime.
products.applications: Transportation, industrial, off-highway, automotive, marine, and medical applications
products.features: High precision position measurement with non-contacting Hall-effect or Inductive technology. Configurable angular ranges from 50 to 360 degrees, ratiometric analog output protocol, and lifetime up to 50 million cycles for harsh environment applications.

products.name: RH Position Sensor
products.design: Absolute magnetostrictive, non-contact position sensor with ultra-high resolution (0.1 µm to 2 µm) and multi-position measurement capability (up to 30 positions), supporting multiple industrial communication protocols.
products.features: High precision absolute magnetostrictive, non-contact sensing with stroke length from 25 mm to 7620 mm. Ultra-high resolution (0.1 µm to 2 µm), multi-position measurement (up to 30 positions with multiple magnets), and comprehensive output options including CANbus, Profibus, DeviceNet, Analog, SSI, PROFINET, EtherNet/IP™, POWERLINK, and EtherCAT®.

specifications.multi_position_measurement: Up to 30 positions with multiple magnets
specifications.outputs: CANbus, Profibus, DeviceNet, Analog, SSI, PROFINET, EtherNet/IP™, POWERLINK, and EtherCAT®
